Stay over night.

Hillton.
Mountton

The same special forces (IDK why I keep doing special forces) comes to put this thread back on track.

Militarized hill (again).

The mutant ponies  capture the hill.

Demilitarized Friendship Hill
Demineralised water fountain.

Organic water pool.

Goo Hill

Goo Hill, where have you gone?

My Goo Hill, you've been gone too long.

Fine Young Canab Hill.

Can a bhill?

Bhill of Canning.

Soda Can Hill

(I'm thirsty right now why not?)

**Edited <time datetime="2023-09-09T05:47:06Z" title="09/09/2023 05:47  AM" data-short="Sep 9">September 9, 2023</time> by Space Kerbalisation Tech**

A million soda cans, all open and full, a million mentos, all poised over the openings. Cue the playing of "Ode to Joy" and let them all drop in.

Giant crater in ground.

(It is like a million blocks of TNT all hissed at once, went kaboom and then were suddenly silent.) - This is a quote from Obi-Wan Minecraftobi.
